markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Vampire Lore](/Feats.aspx?ID=1339) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Dhampir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=215" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 33 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You were raised by your vampiric parent, or you've invested substantial time and energy researching the secrets of your undead progenitors. You gain the trained proficiency rank in [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) and [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14). If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in [Vampire Lore](/Traits.aspx?ID=242).
name: Vampire Lore
